source.title: Sheet
source.description: Sheet component extending Radix Dialog for slide-out panels. `Sheet`, `SheetTrigger`, `SheetContent` with `side` prop (top, right, bottom, left), `SheetHeader`, `SheetTitle`, `SheetDescription`, `SheetFooter`, `SheetClose`. CSS width customisation via className.

source.title: Shadcn Sheet (Unofficial)
source.description: Extended Sheet patterns: settings panels, navigation drawers, mobile action sheets, filter sidebars, notification bars. API reference for `SheetContent` `side` prop, `SheetHeader`, `SheetFooter`, `SheetClose`, focus trapping, portal rendering, production tips.

source.title: Field
source.description: Field component family for accessible forms: `Field`, `FieldSet`, `FieldGroup`, `FieldLabel`, `FieldContent`, `FieldDescription`, `FieldError`, `FieldSeparator`. Orientation props (vertical, horizontal, responsive), `data-invalid` validation, choice cards, Standard Schema error support.

source.title: TanStack Form
source.description: TanStack Form integration: `useForm` hook, Zod schema validation, `form.Field` render prop. Validation modes (`onChange`, `onBlur`, `onSubmit`), `FieldError` display, field types (input, textarea, select, checkbox, radio, switch), array fields with `pushValue`/`removeValue`.

source.title: Button
source.description: Button with `variant` prop (default, outline, ghost, destructive, secondary, link), `size` prop (sm, default, lg, icon, icon-sm, icon-lg), automatic icon spacing, `Spinner` loading, `asChild` polymorphic rendering, `ButtonGroup` composition.

source.title: Sonner
source.description: Sonner toast installation via CLI/manual, `Toaster` component in app layout, `toast()` import, success/error/loading variants, lucide icons customisation, `next-themes` dark mode, CSS variables styling.

source.title: Shadcn Sonner (Unofficial)
source.description: Sonner toast patterns: `toast.success()`, `toast.error()`, `toast.loading()`, `toast.promise()` for async, `toast.custom()` JSX, undo actions, `duration` control, persistent notifications with `duration: Infinity`, icon customisation, position configuration.

source.title: MCP Server
source.description: MCP server enabling AI assistants (Claude Code, Cursor, VS Code, Codex) to browse, search, install registry components. Setup via `npx shadcn mcp init --client`, `components.json` registries config, authentication headers, troubleshooting.

source.title: shadcn
source.description: CLI reference: `init` (dependencies, `cn` util, CSS variables), `add` (`--overwrite`, `--all`, `--path`), `view`, `search`/`list` (`-q` query), `build` for registry JSON. Flags: `--template`, `--base-color`, `--cwd`, `--silent`, `@namespace` syntax.

source.title: components.json
source.description: Project configuration schema: `style`, `tailwind` (`config`, `css`, `baseColor`, `cssVariables`, `prefix`), `rsc`, `tsx`, `aliases` (`components`, `utils`, `ui`, `lib`, `hooks`), `registries` with `@namespace` URLs, authentication headers, `${VAR}` expansion.

source.title: Theming
source.description: CSS variables theming with oklch colours, background/foreground convention, variables (`--primary`, `--secondary`, `--muted`, `--accent`, `--destructive`, `--border`, `--ring`, `--chart-*`, `--sidebar-*`), `@theme inline` directive, base palettes (neutral, stone, zinc, gray, slate).

source.title: Empty
source.description: Empty state placeholder with `Empty`, `EmptyHeader`, `EmptyMedia` (icon/avatar variants), `EmptyTitle`, `EmptyDescription`, `EmptyContent` subcomponents. Supports outline borders via `border` utility, gradient backgrounds, avatar groups, `InputGroup` integration, call-to-action buttons.

source.title: Item
source.description: Flex container with `Item`, `ItemMedia` (icon/image/avatar), `ItemContent`, `ItemTitle`, `ItemDescription`, `ItemActions`, `ItemHeader`, `ItemFooter`, `ItemGroup`, `ItemSeparator`. Variants (default, outline, muted), sizes (default, sm), `asChild` for links, dropdown menus.

source.title: Sidebar
source.description: Composable sidebar: `SidebarProvider`, `Sidebar`, `SidebarContent`, `SidebarGroup`, `SidebarMenu`, `SidebarMenuButton`, `SidebarMenuAction`, `SidebarMenuSub`, `SidebarMenuBadge`, `SidebarMenuSkeleton`. `useSidebar` hook, collapsible modes (offcanvas, icon, none), variants (sidebar, floating, inset), CSS variables theming, keyboard shortcuts, cookie persistence.

source.title: Navigation Menu
source.description: Radix UI navigation menu with `NavigationMenu`, `NavigationMenuList`, `NavigationMenuItem`, `NavigationMenuTrigger`, `NavigationMenuContent`, `NavigationMenuLink`, `NavigationMenuIndicator`, `NavigationMenuViewport`. `asChild` prop for Next.js `Link` integration, dropdown navigation patterns.

source.title: Drawer
source.description: Mobile drawer component built on Vaul library. `Drawer`, `DrawerTrigger`, `DrawerContent`, `DrawerHeader`, `DrawerFooter`, `DrawerClose` subcomponents. Gesture support, responsive Dialog/Drawer pattern for desktop/mobile switching.

source.title: Shadcn Drawer (Unofficial)
source.description: Extended Drawer patterns with Vaul physics-based gestures, snap points, `direction` prop (bottom, top, left, right), nested drawers, controlled `open`/`onOpenChange` state. Responsive dialog-drawer strategy, swipe/drag interactions, production tips.

source.title: Badge
source.description: Badge component for status labels, tags, counts. Variants: default, outline, secondary, destructive. `asChild` prop enables polymorphic rendering as Next.js `Link` or other elements.

source.title: LLMs.txt
source.description: Machine-readable component catalogue for AI assistants. Lists all shadcn/ui components by category: form/input, layout/navigation, overlays/dialogs, feedback/status, display/media. Links to dark mode, forms, monorepo, registry, MCP server documentation.

source.title: Input Group
source.description: `InputGroup` component for enhancing inputs/textareas with icons, text, buttons, tooltips, spinners, labels, dropdowns. `InputGroupAddon` alignment (`inline-start`/`inline-end`, `block-start`/`block-end`), `InputGroupButton` variants, custom controls via `data-slot` attribute.

source.title: Native Select
source.description: Styled native HTML `<select>` with `NativeSelect`, `NativeSelectOption`, `NativeSelectOptGroup`. Option grouping, disabled states, `aria-invalid` validation styling, React Hook Form integration, InputGroup compatibility, mobile-optimised native dropdowns vs custom Select component.

source.title: Spinner
source.description: Loading indicator component with `animate-spin` animation. Customisable size via `size-*` utilities, colour via `text-*` utilities, replaceable icon. Integration examples with Button, Badge, InputGroup, Empty, Item components.

source.title: Registry Item JSON Schema Examples
source.description: Registry item JSON schema examples: `registry:style` with `extends: none`, `registry:theme`, `registry:block`. Covers `cssVars` theme/light/dark, `@layer base`/`components`, `@utility`, `@import`, `@plugin`, `@keyframes` animations, `envVars`, universal items with explicit `target` paths.

source.title: Registry System Introduction
source.description: Registry system overview for distributing custom components, hooks, pages, config, rules via `shadcn` CLI. Framework-agnostic (React, Vue, Svelte). Links to getting-started, authentication, namespaces, examples, schema documentation.

source.title: Registry Setup and Build Guide
source.description: Registry setup: `registry.json` schema with name, homepage, items. Item definition with name, type, files, `registryDependencies`, `dependencies`. `shadcn build` to `public/r/`, `npx shadcn add` URL installation, `@/registry` imports, `registry/[STYLE]/[NAME]` structure.

source.title: Changelog 2025 (newest-first)
source.description: 2025 release history (newest-first): `npx shadcn create` with styles Vega/Nova/Maia/Lyra/Mira (Dec), Registry Directory (Nov), CLI 3.0 namespaced registries MCP (Aug), October components (Spinner, Field, Item), universal items, `radix-ui` migration.

source.title: Registry Directory - shadcn/ui
source.description: Directory of 90+ community registries with `npx shadcn add @<namespace>/<component>` zero-config installation. Includes @magicui, @aceternity, @assistant-ui, @animate-ui, @cult-ui, @motion-primitives, @plate, @supabase, @clerk, @react-aria.
